nodes.text: The Shrine was a location found in the fields of the Golamaran ice flats on the planet Rystan. It was home to an entity known as the Leveler, an object that was greatly revered by the family of Marchion Ro, the leader of the Nihil marauders. Ro sought passage to the Shrine some time after the Battle of Kur, hoping to look upon the Leveler with his cousin, Kufa.
